ActBroadcasting Act
PrecisDecision of the Governor in Council to DECLINE to SET ASIDE or to REFER BACK to the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission RULINGS CRTC 2005-246 and 247 which approved the application by Satellite Radio Inc. and SIRIUS Canada Inc. for a broadcasting licence to operate a terrestrial subscription radio undertaking.
